text: The Second Mexican Empire (), Officially the Mexican Empire (), was a Constitutional Monarchy and Client state of the Second French Empire in Mexico, it was ruled by Maximilian of Habsburg who ruled as Maximilian I of Mexico and his wife Charlotte of Mexico, it was established during the Second French intervention in Mexico as a client state to compete with the powerful United States, This is nothing related to the First Mexican Empire of Agust√≠n I. == References == Category:1864 establishments Category:1867 disestablishments Category:19th century in Mexico Category:1860s in North America Category:History of Mexico Category:Former monarchies of North America
title: Second Mexican Empire
